title: Why did I get banned
body: I'm just wondering why I got 5 afk 20 min bans, I feel like it's unfair after a game I finished playing it said I was afk and due to that I had to do 20 minute bans for 5 games. I did dc from the game but then I reconnected back to it if you have a look riot

replies.body: You can read more about the Leaver Buster system here; https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ

You leave a game at all, intentionally or not, you will get 'marks' (just a name I use) down on your account. Accumulate enough of them and you'll get a 20 min queue. It sucks I know, I have suffered 3 in the past few months (personally, I feel like I should of got at least 1). But Riot does what it can do to punish avid afkers and sometimes it trickles on to people who were unlucky to suffer power outages, bad timing of starting a game and the like in the space of a few days/weeks.
